remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體控制項。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 按鈕 」 的常值字串。The "button" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以動態方式新增Web Form 網頁的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically add an control to the Web Forms page. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出按一下 控制項時，是否執行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果按一下 控制項時會執行驗證，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 頁面驗證判斷輸入的控制項要與驗證控制項在頁面上，所有通過驗證的控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 您可以指定或判斷是否在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時藉由按下控制項屬性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要避免執行驗證，將屬性設`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 這個屬性常用的事件處理常式的以防止頁面驗證時按一下 [取消] 或重設按鈕時所發生的事件。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以防止發生頁面驗證。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 請注意，方法會獨立啟用每個驗證控制項。Note that the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonCausesValidation/CS/htmlbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonCausesValidation/VB/htmlbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 引發 事件，並註冊用戶端指令碼，以產生回傳。

span.span: Raises the event and registers client script for generating a postback.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，使它一律會顯示使用粗體文字。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always displays the with bold text. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlbutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlbutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlbutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlbutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

Raises the event.

summary.span: 這個方法可讓您提供該事件的自訂處理常式。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 這個事件會導致用戶端與伺服器之間的來回往返。This event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 從用戶端刻意不同`OnClick`事件。It is deliberately different from the client-side `OnClick` event. 如果執行的程式碼之間發生衝突事件和程式碼執行用戶端`OnClick`事件、 伺服器端事件指示將會覆寫用戶端程式碼。If a conflict exists between code run with a event and code run by a client-side `OnClick` event, the server-side event instructions will override the client-side code. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式指定和程式碼的事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 當按下控制項時，會顯示在文字方塊中輸入的值。When the control is clicked, the value entered in the text box is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式指定和程式碼的事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/CS/htmlbuttonconstructorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/VB/htmlbuttonconstructorvb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 回傳至伺服器時，便會引發 控制項的事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控制項，它按下時，引發事件。The method is used by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event. 如果屬性是`true`，則方法呼叫使用中指定的控制項群組屬性。If the property is `true`, the method is called using the group of controls specified in the property. 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 將 控制項的屬性轉譯為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法寫入`onclick`屬性呈現控制項，並接著會呼叫基底方法。The method writes the `onclick` attribute of the rendered control, and then calls the base method. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，讓標題永遠會顯示為控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a title is always displayed for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributes.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用者按一下用戶端 Web 網頁上的 控制項時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks an control on the client Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此伺服器事件會導致用戶端與伺服器之間的來回往返。This server event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 從用戶端刻意不同`OnClick`事件。It is deliberately different from the client-side `OnClick` event. 如果執行的程式碼之間發生衝突事件和程式碼執行用戶端`OnClick`事件、 伺服器端事件指示將會覆寫用戶端程式碼。If a conflict exists between code run with a event and code run by a client-side `OnClick` event, the server-side event instructions will override the client-side code. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式指定和程式碼的事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 當按下控制項時，會顯示在文字方塊中輸入的值。When the control is clicked, the value entered in the text box is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式指定和程式碼的事件處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/CS/htmlbuttonconstructorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/VB/htmlbuttonconstructorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定這個屬性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("") indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將在頁面上的驗證控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以單獨驗證，從其他頁面上的驗證群組。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性來指定驗證群組的名稱，回傳至伺服器時，控制項引發驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 這個屬性沒有作用時，才的值屬性設定為`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員的驗證控制項會驗證當控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定此屬性的值而屬性設定為`true`，當控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有頁面上不會指派給驗證群組的驗證控制項。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要驗證時的控制項控制項回傳至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 頁面包含從使用者擷取資料的兩個文字方塊和兩個控制，以確保該使用者不會離開 [文字] 方塊空白。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制項的第一個文字方塊位於`CityInfoGroup`驗證群組和控制中的第二個方塊是`StateInfoGroup`驗證群組。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 當`CityQueryButton`按下時，只有在控制`CityInfoGroup`驗證群組會進行驗證。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 當`StateQueryButton`按下時，只有在控制`StateInfoGroup`驗證群組會進行驗證。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonValidationGroup/CS/htmlbuttonvalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonValidationGroup/VB/htmlbuttonvalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
